statements: SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, location FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, location FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE amount > 1000 AND location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles');
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_transactions >= 3 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE location LIKE '%California%' OR location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM anomalies
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 123 AND is_fraudulent = true
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE customer_id IN (456, 789) AND is_fraudulent = false ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date, a.anomaly_description FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN anomalies a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type='deposit';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id='12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type='fraud' AND alert_date>'2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT alert_description FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_address = '123 Main St';
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' AND transaction_type = 'Credit';
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Fraud' AND alert_date > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT account_id, merchant FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100
SELECT * FROM accounts JOIN users ON accounts.user_id = users.user_id
SELECT transaction_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers
SELECT account_id, account_balance, account_type FROM accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC
SELECT alert_date, alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Urgent'
SELECT flag_name, flag_description FROM flags
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers INNER JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id WHERE accounts.account_balance > 10000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT transaction_amount AS amount, transaction_type AS type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customers INNER JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id WHERE account_balance < 0
SELECT alert_date, alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY alert_date DESC
